p: Psychosocial wellbeing in a changing climate may be thwarted by limited financial or physical access to mental health care [ 11, 42, 50, 51, 52, 53, 54, 64]. Lack of access may stem from economics, geography, poor government planning, lack of trust, and/or poorly trained health professionals who may not recognize mental health symptoms or inappropriately triage patients with mental health needs.
